doc.summary: Gets the mod to which object belongs.
doc.text: Gets the mod to which object belongs.

doc.summary: Gets the id of the object being registered.
doc.text: Gets the id of the object being registered.

doc.summary: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/resources/ResourceKey">ResourceKey</ref> of the object being registered.
doc.text: Gets the <ref cls="net/minecraft/resources/ResourceKey">ResourceKey</ref> of the object being registered. If the object is registered  without a registry key, the <ref cls="java/util/Optional">Optional</ref> will be empty.

doc.summary: Gets the registry key of the registry the object is registered in.
doc.text: Gets the registry key of the registry the object is registered in. If the object is registered  without a registry key, the <ref cls="java/util/Optional">Optional</ref> will be empty.

doc.summary: Provides some data that is present during registration like the id and registry key of the object  being registered.
doc.text: Provides some data that is present during registration like the id and registry key of the object  being registered.
